channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins requests-plugin Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins requests-plugin Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34782|2024-08-03T09:22:09.947Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20requests-plugin%20plugin
item.description: An incorrect permission check in Jenkins requests-plugin Plugin 2.2.16 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to view the list of pending requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-21674|2024-08-03T18:23:28.263Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20requests-plugin%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins requests-plugin Plugin 2.2.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to view the list of pending requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-21676|2024-08-03T18:23:28.305Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20requests-plugin%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins requests-plugin Plugin 2.2.7 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to send test emails to an attacker-specified email address.

item.title: CVE-2021-21675|2024-08-03T18:23:27.476Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20requests-plugin%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins requests-plugin Plugin 2.2.12 and earlier allows attackers to create requests and/or have administrators apply pending requests.
